Came highly recommended from my folks in the game design industry, Played first two Bioshocks at easy difficulty because I'm a scaredy cat but Infinite was so much more fun with an additional character tagging alongside you, far better graphics and superior gameplay that I cranked the difficulty upto it's highest. The story was easy to follow in the beginning, but they lost me at the climax because a lot of the things that take place are not explained properly like how the siphon works or what exactly is the deal with the Luteces or how Fitzroy, a normal maid, rises up as the leader of the rebellion, etc. All of it's just shoehorned in. Then at the end, the story completely falls apart with too many plotholes and a hamfisted parallel universes ending to somehow link Infinite's universe to 1&2's. The cherry on top was Burial at Sea DLCs, which basically retcon not just the main game's ending but also the gameplay to be more in line with the previous games. That wouldn't be so bad if it were not for the fact that they never tell the player that they're doing this. After playing through Infinite and CitC DLC on highest difficulties with no issues, I was dead confused as to why I kept dying over and over again in Burial at Sea DLC on the same difficulty or why I was consistently struggling to find ANY ammo for either my weapons or powers to deal with the hostile elements, for that matter. Problem is- they turn the difficulty curve on its head instantly and without informing the player; the two most horrendous sins in the world of level design- both combined together in this case. Despite being a scaredy cat who never plays survival horror games, I still believe Burial at Sea to be objectively the worst part of this series so much so that I'd rather play Bioshock 1 and 2 anyday of the week over that crap (Infinite is still my top favorite of the series though). The ending for Burial at Sea was so bad, full of plotholes and unsatisfying the likes of which I have probably never experienced in my 15 years of gaming. Big no to that DLC. In fact, CitC wasn't that good either in terms of content.

过很久又下回来了，这次没再遇到过闪退卡死的问题，也把剩下的剧情包括DLC打通了。
叙事手法、画面演出、剧情衔接算是顶级的，体验很棒。

但你要说他第九艺术，我觉得还差一点。比起那些能称得上是“艺术”的作品，它更像是融合了一些“艺术”影子的，瑰丽的现代商业绘画。
这个游戏不仅讲了一个英雄救美的故事，里面还包括了蒸汽朋克、量子力学、反乌托邦、平行宇宙......就题材而言，确实无所不包，让人玩起来十分过瘾。
但在我眼里，这些看起来深奥的东西写进去，更多是为了增加游戏的观赏性，让这个老套的英雄救美的故事不再显得那么枯燥乏味；
你要说他想写深邃的题材，那整个故事背景就未免沾上了点虚无主义和历史循环论、宿命论的味道。它做到了对现今社会种种现象的影射与反思，但却又止步于此，没有再进一步提出如何作出改变，如何去塑造一个更好的未来，而这在我眼里是算不上优秀的。

虽然离艺术还差一步之遥，不过就这游戏表现出的反独裁、反种族主义，以及自我赎罪的思想，已经吊打其他游戏不知道多少条街了。
I don't like FPS games. But playing on PC changed that for this game and a few others. I can't play games like this without a mouse and keyboard to save my life.

Bioshock Infinite is a monument to video game storytelling. Rapture may be a more atmospheric and interesting setting, but the jingoistic cleanliness of Columbia makes the shocking violence all the more horrifying. And while Andrew Ryan holds a special place in my heart, I think Infinite has a better story and characters. Booker and Elizabeth are two of the most fascinating characters in game history, and their journey will haunt you.

gute Storyline. Gutes Game

Absolute masterpiece.
The story is incredible, and is one of the best in any piece of fiction I've ever seen. The game mechanics leave a bit to be desired, especially in terms of your weapon wheel but it's nothing that dampens your enjoyment. Some of the dialogues are so memorable and really leave you with a ton to think about once the journey ends. Ken Levine, you absolute genius. The city of Columbia is jaw droppingly beautiful and although you cannot explore the world to your heart's content (as this is a linear story driven shooter), some of the visuals are just breathtaking. But the main draw of this game, (like the previous two BioShocks) is the story. It makes you smile, laugh and cry.
10/10
The game play was some what linear, But a very enjoyable story. They did a GREAT job with streamlining the visuals. A work of art for it's time, and well worth your time to enjoy!

Очередная история об утопической жизни в изолированном от всех мире. В этой игре поднимается слишком много вопросов вне основного сюжета. Если в первых частях, мы видим полную разруху от того, что осталось от такого социума, то в этой скорее мы являемся дьяволом. который уничтожит покой мирных горожан в "идеальном" городе в небесах. 
Сквозь пальцы, печатающие данные строки, все же эту игру можно назвать одной из столбов вдохновения и в этом направлении, и уже будет сложно сделать что-то даже приближенно похожее на Infinite.

Compared to the previous Bioshock 1 & 2, Infinite trades gameplay complexitiy for a more in depth story and great graphics. 
Even with the tone down gameplay, it's still trading a great game... for another great game.

Uma história do caralho, um puta guplay, personagens fodas, armas cássicas como a Mauser C96, Bioshock Infinite é lindo do começo ao fim, os npcs são vivos e agem como pessoas agiriam, esse jogo é definitivamente um must play.

The game is certainly good, but not anything I would recommend over the first two games; the gameplay is faster, but so many things have been removed it ends up feeling shallower. 2 weapon limit, extremely boring gear passives meant to replace Gene Tonics... The biggest saving grace is the interactions between Elizabeth and Booker, but even then the villain is extremely weak compared to Ryan from the first game, or even Lamb from the second. 
The DLC is fantastic, though. Get the whole lot on a good sale, and it's well worth it.

生化奇兵三部曲的收官作，一款逐渐被时间掩埋的佳作
○少有的优秀烧脑剧情FPS游戏
○哪怕是10年的画面，放到现在仍不算过时
○艺术表现出色，许多场景设计都让十分惊艳
○究极好队友伊丽莎白，老父亲贴心小棉袄
○三部曲价格平民，折扣更划算
总而言之，是个到处都充满了惊喜的老游戏，游玩体感舒适，为三部曲画上完美句号，推荐品尝
